title: Ticket #2851: RFE: reread config files once per cycle in negotiator
description: Need a knob to re-read config files once per cycle to avoid (multiple) use of condor_reconfig and communication side effects in negotiator.
remarks:
2012-Feb-29 17:35:42 by eje:
TEST:

Begin with configuration: 

NEGOTIATOR_DEBUG = D_ACCOUNTANT | D_FULLDEBUG
NEGOTIATOR_INTERVAL = 20
NEGOTIATOR_CYCLE_DELAY = 5

NUM_CPUS = 10

# instruct the negotiator to reread configuration each cycle:
NEGOTIATOR_READ_CONFIG_BEFORE_CYCLE = True

# concurrency limit:
TEST_LIMIT = 1

Spin up a pool, and submit 10 jobs requiring concurrency limit TEST: 

universe = vanilla
cmd = /bin/sleep
args = 600
should_transfer_files = if_needed
when_to_transfer_output = on_exit
concurrency_limits = TEST
queue 10

Following the negotiator log you should see the new limit take effect: 

$ tail -f NegotiatorLog | grep -e '-------' -e 'Limits --' -e 'Limit:'
02/29/12 16:24:37 Previous Limits --
02/29/12 16:24:37 Current Limits --
02/29/12 16:24:37 ---------- Finished Negotiation Cycle ----------
02/29/12 16:24:49 ---------- Started Negotiation Cycle ----------
02/29/12 16:24:49 Previous Limits --
02/29/12 16:24:49 Current Limits --
02/29/12 16:24:49 Concurrency Limit: test is 0.000000
02/29/12 16:24:49 Concurrency Limit: test is 1.000000
02/29/12 16:24:49 ---------- Finished Negotiation Cycle ----------
02/29/12 16:25:09 ---------- Started Negotiation Cycle ----------
02/29/12 16:25:09 Previous Limits --
02/29/12 16:25:09   Limit: test = 1.000000
02/29/12 16:25:09 Current Limits --
02/29/12 16:25:09   Limit: test = 1.000000
02/29/12 16:25:09 Concurrency Limit: test is 1.000000
02/29/12 16:25:09 ---------- Finished Negotiation Cycle ----------

Now, re-edit the config file above, to increase the concurrency limit: 

TEST_LIMIT = 5

Resave the above change. With the new flag NEGOTIATOR_READ_CONFIG_BEFORE_CYCLE = True, you should see the negotiator respond to the updated concurrency limit: 

02/29/12 16:25:29 ---------- Started Negotiation Cycle ----------
02/29/12 16:25:29 Previous Limits --
02/29/12 16:25:29   Limit: test = 1.000000
02/29/12 16:25:29 Current Limits --
02/29/12 16:25:29   Limit: test = 1.000000
02/29/12 16:25:29 Concurrency Limit: test is 1.000000
02/29/12 16:25:30 Concurrency Limit: test is 2.000000
02/29/12 16:25:30 Concurrency Limit: test is 3.000000
02/29/12 16:25:30 Concurrency Limit: test is 4.000000
02/29/12 16:25:30 Concurrency Limit: test is 5.000000
02/29/12 16:25:30 ---------- Finished Negotiation Cycle ----------

Without the new flag enabled, negotiator requires a reconfig for the limit update to take effect.
